title: Why is Loro Piana so laughably expensive? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because you’re not worthy a salary that allows you to pay for this kind of product, possibly. Fashion brands are not expensive for those they want to sell to. If a brand is expensive for you is because you’re too poor to buy it, or too greedy to allow yourself such a thing.

So you can see for yourself I suggest you, on your own ,google the brand, and research the brands heritage, and their commitment to quality manufacturing, sustainability, and how & where they source their raw materials.
